mapper.select: SELECT num, writer, content, target_id, ref_group, comment_group, deleted, board_qna_comment.regdate FROM board_qna_comment INNER JOIN board_user ON board_qna_comment.writer = board_user.id WHERE ref_group=#{ref_group}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_qna_comment (num, writer, content, target_id, ref_group, comment_group, regdate) VALUES(#{num}, #{writer}, #{content}, #{target_id}, #{ref_group}, #{comment_group}, SYSDATE)
